feed.title: La Vérendrye (Réserve faunique) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , La Vérendrye (Réserve faunique)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:29 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Maniwaki Airport 10:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
Temperature: -1.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 56 %
Wind Chill: -4
Dewpoint: -9.0°C
Wind: ENE 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning this afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow or rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow changing to periods of rain mixed with snow near noon. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming west 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
